_sText:
Zm_Greenbriar
===========================
This is version beta 5 of Zm_Greenbriar, a new zombie map that I created solely for the purpose of having an apocalyptic experience unlike any other.

The map includes the following in the current stage:

-- Intricate Player Spawns and Multilevel Layout

-- Optimization, applied nodraw to outside surfaces

-- Dynamic and light_spot lighting, with variable lightmap edits

-- Custom music and ambience

-- Steam, flickering lights, environmental scares

-- **Custom made random weapon boxes like in Nazi Zombies**, including one for rifles, sub-machine guns, and pistols, all in balanced locations; boxes can be used every 30 seconds and emit one of 4 random guns of their sub-class.
  
-- Custom made healing station in which players can gain up to 80 health every 30 seconds.  

-- Balanced system of gameplay such that the advantages of both zombies and humans are relatively even.  

-- Optimized and created for Zombie: Riot! Mod as well:

Zriot Mod: [ http://forums.alliedmods.net/showthread.php?p=647040 ]

Further edits will be made in the near future!  **Make sure to report all errors**, as this map is not perfect.  All criticism is welcome!  _Enjoy!_

-The Fool, May 2011
